蝨潰し: (しらみつぶし) - very thorough search (for contraband, escaped convict, etc.); fine-tooth-comb search; exhaustive search; scouring
蝨潰しに: (しらみつぶしに) - one by one; going over with a fine-tooth comb
蝮: (ふく) - Viper , pit viper (especialmente a mamushi, Gloydius blomhoffi)
蝮丼: (まむしどん) - bowl of eel and rice (donburi)
蝮草: (マムシグサ) - Arisaema serratum (species of jack-in-the-pulpit)
蝲蛄: (ザリガニ) - crayfish (esp. Japanese crayfish, Cambaroides japonicus or red swamp crayfish, Procambarus clarkii)
蝶々魚: (チョウチョウウオ) - Oriental butterflyfish (Chaetodon auripes, species found mostly from Japan to Taiwan)
蝶つがい: (ちょうつがい) - hinge (e.g. on a door); joint (esp. an anatomical joint)
蝶よ花よ: (ちょうよはなよ) - bringing up (one's daughter) like a princess
蝶形骨: (ちょうけいこつ) - sphenoid bone (of the skull)
蝶斑: (チョウハン) - raccoon butterflyfish (Chaetodon lunula); moon butterflyfish
蝶番: (ちょうばん) - hinge (e.g. on a door); joint (esp. an anatomical joint)
蝶番い: (ちょうつがい) - hinge (e.g. on a door); joint (esp. an anatomical joint)
蝶蝶魚: (チョウチョウウオ) - Oriental butterflyfish (Chaetodon auripes, species found mostly from Japan to Taiwan)
蝶豆: (チョウマメ) - butterfly pea (Clitoria ternatea); Asian pigeonwings
蝶貝: (ちょうがい) - silver-lipped pearl oyster (Pinctada maxima); golden-lipped pearl oyster; white-lipped pearl oyster
蝶鮫: (チョウザメ) - sturgeon (esp. the green sturgeon, Acipenser medirostris)
蝸廬: (かろ) - little house/my humble home; (original meaning) snail shell
蝸牛: (カタツムリ) - (でんでんむし is more col.)  snail; (かぎゅう only)   cochlea
蝸牛神経: (かぎゅうしんけい) - cochlear nerve
蝸牛角上: (かぎゅうかくじょう) - (yoji) trifling (fight); (a conflict) between small countries
蝸牛角上の争い: (かぎゅうかくじょうのあらそい) - fighting over nothing; making a mountain out of a molehill
蝸角: (かかく) - eyestalk (on a snail); narrow place/cramped space
蝸角の争い: (かかくのあらそい) - fighting over nothing; making a mountain out of a molehill
蝿取: (はいとり) - catching flies/fly-catcher/flytrap/flypaper; jumping spider
蝿取り: (はいとり) - catching flies/fly-catcher/flytrap/flypaper; jumping spider
蝿取り草: (ハエトリソウ) - Venus flytrap; Venus's flytrap
蝿取草: (ハエトリソウ) - Venus flytrap; Venus's flytrap
蝿取蜘蛛: (ハエトリグモ) - jumping spider (any spider of family Salticidae)
蝿地獄: (ハエジゴク) - Venus flytrap; Venus's flytrap
蝿虎: (ハエトリグモ) - jumping spider (any spider of family Salticidae)
融く: (とく) - to dissolve (paint); to scramble (eggs); to melt (metal, etc.); to mix (water with flour, etc.)
融ける: (とける) - (解ける is sometimes used also) to melt; to thaw; to fuse; to dissolve
融け込む: (とけこむ) - to melt into/to merge into; to fit in/to adapt/to blend
融剤: (ゆうざい) - flux (substance mixed with a solid in order to lower its melting point); fusing agent
融合: (yuugou) - aglutinação, adesão, fusão, combinação, mistura, união
融和をはかる: (ゆうわをはかる) - to try to be reconciled (with); to take measures to bring about reconciliation
融和を図る: (ゆうわをはかる) - to try to be reconciled (with); to take measures to bring about reconciliation
融和路線: (ゆうわろせん) - (yoji) policy of reconciliation
融氷期: (ゆうひょうき) - thawing season; thaw; season when the ice melts
融氷液: (ゆうひょうえき) - deicer; de-icer; deicing fluid; de-icing fluid
融点: (ゆうてん) - fusion point; melting point
融解熱: (ゆうかいねつ) - the heat of fusion
融資枠: (ゆうしわく) - ceiling on loans; credit line
融資額: (ゆうしがく) - amount financed; loan amount
融通がきく: (ゆうずうがきく) - to be flexible; to be accommodating
融通が利く: (ゆうずうがきく) - to be flexible; to be accommodating
融通手形: (ゆうずうてがた) - an accommodation bill
融通無碍: (ゆうづうむげ) - (yoji) free, unfettered and flexible; versatile; adaptable
融通無礙: (ゆうづうむげ) - (yoji) free, unfettered and flexible; versatile; adaptable
融雪: (ゆうせつ) - melted snow; melting of snow
融雪ヒータ: (ゆうせつヒータ) - snow melting heater
融雪機: (ゆうせつき) - snow-melting machine; snow melter
螟蛾: (メイガ) - pyralid (any moth of family Pyralidae, many of which have larvae that devour foodstuffs)
螠虫: (おきくむし) - chrysalis of a swallowtail butterfly (esp. of species Atrophaneura alcinous)
螢光ペン: (けいこうペン) - highlighter; highlighter pen
螢光灯: (けいこうとう) - fluorescent lamp/fluorescent light; person who is slow to react/someone slow on the uptake
螢光燈: (けいこうとう) - fluorescent lamp/fluorescent light; person who is slow to react/someone slow on the uptake
螢火: (ほたるび) - light of a firefly
螢雪: (けいせつ) - diligence in studying (e.g. continuing to study even in such poor light as offered by a firefly or that reflected by snow); diligent study
螫す: (さす) - to sting (i.e. bee, wasp, etc.)
螭竜: (あまりゅう) - rain dragon; mythical beast with yellowish green skin and red tail
螳螂: (カマキリ) - (occ. written 杜父魚) praying mantis (esp. the narrow-winged mantis, Tenodera angustipennis)
